Package backend

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
backend.PollyObject
backend.ColorfulObject
backend.Shape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class Shape
extends ColorfulObject
implements java.io.Serializable
A type of ColorfulObject that allows for the utilization of Shapes from the processing library.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • shape

      protected transient processing.core.PShape shape

  • Constructor Details

    • Shape

      public Shape​(processing.core.PApplet sketch, float x, float y, float strokeWeight, int[] fillColor, int[] boarderColor)
      Constructor for Shape
      Parameters:
      sketch - a reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library
      x - A float to represent the initial x starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate
      y - A float to represent the initial y starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate
      strokeWeight - Represents the line-thickness
      fillColor - The internal color of the object represented by four values ranged 0-255 (Red, Green, Blue, and Alpha respectively)
      boarderColor - The outline color of the object represented by three values ranged 0-255 (Red, Green, and Blue respectively)

  • Method Details

    • init

      protected void init​(processing.core.PApplet sketch)
      Function used during the serialization process to restore transient processing library-related variables
      Overrides:
      init in class ColorfulObject
      Parameters:
      sketch - a reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library

    • setSettings

      protected void setSettings()
      Set the initial color and stroke settings for shapes. Use in constructor of instanciable sub-classes.

    • setStrokeWeight

      protected void setStrokeWeight​(float wgt)
      Set the current stroke thickness for the objects
      Parameters:
      wgt - The desired thickness (in pixels)

    • setBoarderColor

      protected void setBoarderColor​(int r, int g, int b)
      Set the outline/boarder of the object to the specified color
      Overrides:
      setBoarderColor in class ColorfulObject
      Parameters:
      r - Represents the red value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)
      g - Represents the green value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)
      b - Represents the blue value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)

    • setFillColor

      protected void setFillColor​(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Set the internal/fill of the object to the specified color
      Overrides:
      setFillColor in class ColorfulObject
      Parameters:
      r - Represents the red value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)
      g - Represents the green value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)
      b - Represents the blue value in color combinations (range between 0 - 255)
      a - Represents the alpha (transparent) value for the color (range between 0 - 255)

    • setRelativeRotate

      protected void setRelativeRotate​(float r)
      Set relative angle change in rotation of the object
      Overrides:
      setRelativeRotate in class PollyObject
      Parameters:
      r - The desired raw rotation angle in degrees (from the original rotation NOT relative from current rotation)
